name: project Name
nextAction: action to consider on initial submit

platformIndependence.isHardwareDependent: does project have mandatory dependencies (i.e. hardware)
platformIndependence.isSoftwarePltIndependent: are open source components independent of hardware
platformIndependence.pltIndependenceDesc: open source components platform independence description

documentation.isDocumentationAvailable: does documentation exist for source code, use cases etc

NonePII.collectsNonePII: does project collect or use non-PII data

authorizeFollowUp: permission to contact someone for follow-up on submission

deploymentCountries: list of countries project actively deployed in

privacy.isPrivacyCompliant: confirm project complies with all relevant privacy laws
privacyComplianceList: list of relevant privacy laws project complies with

localIntlLaws.isLocIntlAdherent: does project adhere to international and domestic laws
locIntlComplianceList: list of applicable international & domestic laws project complies with

standards.evidenceSupport: links to provide evidence of supporting standards

bestPractices.implementBestPractices: does project implement design, technical, sector best practices
bestPracticesList: list of best practices adhered to

types: list types of PII data collected
PII.thirdPartyDataSharing: does project share PII data with 3rd parties
dataSharingIncidents: describe circumstances for sharing PII data with 3rd parties

riskStrategy.riskReductionExists: does project have strategies to minimize adverse impacts on privacy
riskStrategy.riskReductionStrategyDesc: strategies to minimize adverse impacts on privacy
riskStrategy.privacySecurityStrategy: does project ensure the privacy and security of this data
riskReductionPIISteps: steps taken to prevent adverse impact related to PII

content.collectStoreDistribute: does project collect, store or distribute content
content.type: kind of content collected, stored or distributed
content.contentFilter: does project have mechanisms for mechanisms for detecting and moderating inappropriate/illegal

communication.userInteraction: does project facilitate interactions with or between users
communication.underageProtection: does project address safety and security of underage users
communication.underageProtectionPolicy: steps to address safety and security of underage users

harassment.harassmentProtection: does projects prootect users against grief, abuse and harassment
harassmentProtectionSteps: steps taken to protect users against gried, abuse etc

harm.preventHarm: does project ensure it prevent, anticipates or does no harm
riskMitigationStepsPreventHarm: list mitigations used to prevent no harm
harm.additionalMechanismsInfo: additional info on project's mechanisms, processes or policies

termsOfServiceURLs: links to privacy policies and terms of service
